content.rendered:
There for you.

We’re there for you when the weather is frightful, the sniffles won’t stop, and you need reliable care – fast.

Get started

Life is unpredictable. Healthcare doesn’t have to be.

Here’s how Canadians coast-to-coast are using Maple to solve their health problems, big and small.

“Maple is incredibly innovative! I have a crippling fear of going into clinics or interacting with doctors in person. Maple made it extremely easy for me to speak with a healthcare provider from the comfort of my own home.”

Orianna Schaap
St. Thomas, Ontario

“Maple is incredibly innovative! I have a crippling fear of going into clinics or interacting with doctors in person. Maple made it extremely easy for me to speak with a healthcare provider from the comfort of my own home.”

Orianna Schaap
St. Thomas, Ontario

Life is unpredictable. Healthcare doesn’t have to be.

Here’s how Canadians coast-to-coast are using Maple to solve their health problems, big and small.

“My family was away camping and my wife started to have symptoms of a previous condition. We loaded up Maple, connected her to a doctor, and she was prescribed the medication she needed. The prescription was faxed to a drugstore about an hour away, where we picked it up. The convenience of this app has rescued us many times!”

Curtis Chiasson
Fort McMurray, Alberta

“My family was away camping and my wife started to have symptoms of a previous condition. We loaded up Maple, connected her to a doctor, and she was prescribed the medication she needed. The prescription was faxed to a drugstore about an hour away, where we picked it up. The convenience of this app has rescued us many times!”

Curtis Chiasson
Fort McMurray, Alberta

Life is unpredictable. Healthcare doesn’t have to be.

Here’s how Canadians coast-to-coast are using Maple to solve their health problems, big and small.

“My wife got sick yesterday. It was the first time we needed a doctor in Canada. Maple saved us. Today, my wife woke up saying that she feels much better. Thank you from the bottom of my heart.”

Chengeer Lee
Toronto, Ontario

“My wife got sick yesterday. It was the first time we needed a doctor in Canada. Maple saved us. Today, my wife woke up saying that she feels much better. Thank you from the bottom of my heart.”

Chengeer Lee
Toronto, Ontario

Life is unpredictable. Healthcare doesn’t have to be.

Here’s how Canadians coast-to-coast are using Maple to solve their health problems, big and small.

“Finding Maple and learning how incredibly patient-centred this service is helped put my mind at ease. There is a real human aspect to the relationship between healthcare experts on Maple and their patients. Doctors generously share their expertise, kindness, and care, while patients feel empowered and supported. During a pandemic, being included in Maple’s circle of care makes all the difference in the world.”

Magdalena Smolewski
Toronto, Ontario

“Finding Maple and learning how incredibly patient-centred this service is helped put my mind at ease. There is a real human aspect to the relationship between healthcare experts on Maple and their patients. Doctors generously share their expertise, kindness, and care, while patients feel empowered and supported. During a pandemic, being included in Maple’s circle of care makes all the difference in the world.”

Magdalena Smolewski
Toronto, Ontario

Life is unpredictable. Healthcare doesn’t have to be.

Here’s how Canadians coast-to-coast are using Maple to solve their health problems, big and small.

“I live in a very small community in Nova Scotia. If you live here, you’re probably already familiar with the agonizing shortage of physicians and nurse practitioners. Maple was there for me when I needed help. That’s why virtual care is so important.”

Ashley Coady-Deagle
Stellarton, Nova Scotia

“I live in a very small community in Nova Scotia. If you live here, you’re probably already familiar with the agonizing shortage of physicians and nurse practitioners. Maple was there for me when I needed help. That’s why virtual care is so important.”

Ashley Coady-Deagle
Stellarton, Nova Scotia

Life is unpredictable. Healthcare doesn’t have to be.

Here’s how Canadians coast-to-coast are using Maple to solve their health problems, big and small.

“Picture this: a pandemic lockdown. No medical clinics accepting walk-in patients. The 811 HealthLine is always ringing busy. You don’t have time to bring four children to an emergency room and wait six hours to see a doctor. Someone tells you about Maple. You sign up and within minutes, you’re speaking to a doctor online. It’s safe, easy, and affordable. It costs less to see a Maple doctor than to go out for dinner. Knowing that my family will always be taken care of is priceless.”

Nicholas Baumann
Medicine Hat, Alberta

“Picture this: a pandemic lockdown. No medical clinics accepting walk-in patients. The 811 HealthLine is always ringing busy. You don’t have time to bring four children to an emergency room and wait six hours to see a doctor. Someone tells you about Maple. You sign up and within minutes, you’re speaking to a doctor online. It’s safe, easy, and affordable. It costs less to see a Maple doctor than to go out for dinner. Knowing that my family will always be taken care of is priceless.”

Nicholas Baumann
Medicine Hat, Alberta

Take charge of your health with our free Wellness Quiz.

If you’re wondering which areas of your health might need some extra love and attention, start with our health assessment tool. The quiz covers several primary health topics, and you’ll receive personalized content and suggestions to help improve your well-being.

After all, don’t we want to start the new year on a healthy foot? Click the link below to begin the Wellness Quiz.

Get started

Get reliable answers.

Cold, flu, or COVID-19?
COVID-19’s possible ending
Winter health tips
Seasonal affective disorder
Seven health warning signs

Patients love using Maple

We have thousands of positive ratings from people just like you.

  6K Ratings   2K Ratings

There for you, so you can cherish what’s important.

It’s the time we spend with friends and family that makes the holidays special. Put your health first, so you can be present for the people you love most.

Register

  • When has Maple been there for you?

    Note: If you’ve seen a Maple doctor, please do not include the name of the physician or specialist you saw on Maple. We also ask that you avoid sharing the name of a specific condition you may have received treatment for, or any medications you may have been prescribed for on Maple. These guidelines are here to preserve our doctors' privacy. Residents of Quebec are not eligible.

  • (To be eligible, you must use the email address associated with an active Maple account. Don’t have an account? Sign up now.)
  • If your story is chosen as one of the ten winning submissions, you will be asked to provide:
    • Your full name
    • Your city and province of residence
    • A photo of yourself
    Your story could be featured in future Maple marketing campaigns and on Maple’s website to help spread the word to other Canadians who are in search of a timely and quality option for healthcare.
